msgstr.redo-help: Redo the last command that was undone
msgstr.toggleMultiMode-help: Multi selection mode. Work with Tweak
msgstr.toggleOrtho-help: Change between orthogonal view or perspective view
msgstr.geometryBackground-help: Background color of the Geometry window
msgstr.vertexDisplay-help: Change how vertices are normally displayed
msgstr.unselectedSize-help: Size in pixels of unselected vertices (0.0 = not shown)
msgstr.selectedSize-help: Size in pixels of selected vertices
msgstr.magnetVertexSize-help: Size in pixels of magnet mask vertices
msgstr.edgeDisplay-help: Change how edges are normally displayed
msgstr.unselectedWidth-help: Width in pixels of unselected edges
msgstr.selectedWidth-help: Width in pixels of selected edges
msgstr.hardEdgeWidth-help: Width in pixels of hard edges
msgstr.highlighting-help: Change how mouse-over highlighting is normally displayed
msgstr.unselected-help: Color for highlighting of items which are not yet selected
msgstr.selected-help: Color for highlighting of items which are already selected
msgstr.selection-help: Change how selected items are normally displayed
msgstr.selectionColor-help: Color for items currently selected (but not currently highlighted by mouse-over)
msgstr.informationText-help: Change how the Status Bar shown in Geometry windows is normally displayed. (Note: the Information Line options are in the User Interface tab)
msgstr.infoText-help: Color of text in the Status Bar
msgstr.infoBackground-help: Color of background for Status Bar
msgstr.infoVerbose-help: Show additional information (if available) about the selected items
msgstr.normalDisplay-help: Change how Normals are displayed; see [View | Show | Show Normals] which toggles display of normals
msgstr.normalLength-help: Length in wings units of normals
msgstr.material-help: Change how materials are displayed in the normal Wings 3D workspace
msgstr.axes-help: Change the way the Axes are displayed
msgstr.axesToGrid-help: Limit the display of the axes to within the ground-plane grid area, instead of out to 'infinity'
msgstr.miniAxis-help: Display the moving Mini Axes in the bottom left of the Geometry window. This option is independent of the display of the main axes, see [View | Show | Axes]
msgstr.xPlusColor-help: Color of the standard X axe, in positive direction
msgstr.yPlusColor-help: Color of the standard Y axe, in positive direction
msgstr.zPlusColor-help: Color of the standard Z axe, in positive direction
msgstr.xMinusColor-help: Color of the standard X axe, in negative direction
msgstr.yMinusColor-help: Color of the standard Y axe, in negative direction
msgstr.zMinusColor-help: Color of the standard Z axe, in negative direction
msgstr.grid-help: Change the way the ground plane is displayed
msgstr.gridColor-help: Color of the ground-plane grid lines
msgstr.forceAAGrid-help: Always show the grid when the view is aligned along one of the major axes, regardless of current [View | Show | Ground Plane] setting
msgstr.forceAAOrtho-help: Always go into Orthographic mode when the view is aligned along one of the major axes (see X, Y, Z Hotkeys) regardless of current [View | Orthographic] setting
msgstr.cameraPref-help: Wings3D assumes a Three Button Scroll Mouse, and Wings3D Camera Mode
msgstr.mouseButtons-help: Set the option to One, Two or (the default) Three button mouse
msgstr.cameraMode-help: Camera mode and behavior. Linked to the number of mouse buttons.  The default is Wings 3D. Nendo camera mode can be used with a one- or two-button mouse, and Blender camera mode can be used with a two- or three-button mouse. All other camera modes require a three-button mouse
msgstr.rotationSpeed-help: Step size in pixels moved when the mouse is used to rotate the scene
msgstr.panSpeed-help: Step size in pixels moved when the mouse is used to pan the scene
msgstr.keyPanSpeed-help: Step size in pixels moved when the Arrow keys are used to pan the scene
msgstr.scrollWheel-help: Change the speed and behavior of zooming using a scroll wheel
msgstr.wheelZoom-help: Use the scroll wheel to zoom
msgstr.aimZoom-help: Enables auto aiming while zooming the camera in when part of the model is highlighted
msgstr.zoomFactor-help: Percentage change in size of scene when zooming in/out
msgstr.altZoomFactor-help: Alternative zoom factor setting, to give a choice of (slower) zooming behavior
msgstr.unidirectionalCamera-help: Allows use of the scroll wheel to Pan in one direction (with Ctrl+Scroll) or Rotate (with Shift+Scroll) around one axis. The Alt key is used to pan/rotate in the opposite direction. This feature is an alternative to tumbling and dragging using mouse movements in camera mode
msgstr.wheelPanRotate-help: Switch on use of scroll wheel for unidirectional camera mode
msgstr.infoLineHelpString-help: Display the additional options in the Information Line
msgstr.panSpeed-help: Step size in pixels moved when the scroll wheel is used to pan the scene
msgstr.rotationStepDegree-help: Step size in degrees when the scroll wheel is used to rotate the scene
msgstr.userInterface-help: Chose different colors and transparency settings for the workspace
msgstr.colors-help: Change the appearance of the workspace
msgstr.geometryBackground-help: Background color of the Geometry windows
msgstr.menubarBackground-help: Background color of the Main Menu
msgstr.menubarText-help: Color of the Main Menu text
msgstr.menuBackground-help: Background color of the Context Menu
msgstr.menuText-help: Color of the Context Menu text
msgstr.menuHighlight-help: Background color of a selected command in a Context Menu
msgstr.menuHighlightText-help: Color of the text of a selected command in a Context Menu
msgstr.infoLineBackground-help: Background color of the Information Line
msgstr.infoLineText-help: Color of the text in the Information Line
msgstr.interfaceIcon-help: Choose the style of the Menu Toolbar Icons
msgstr.advancedMiscPref-help: Ragbag of useful options which have nowhere else to go
msgstr.vectorLength-help: Length of vector in wings units of secondary selections
msgstr.vectorWidth-help: Width in pixels of selected vector
msgstr.clippingPlaneIndicator-help: Change how Clipping Plane are displayed
msgstr.dragPreference-help: Allows you to customize mouse sensitivity/speed during distance, scaling and rotation dragging operations
msgstr.mouseDraggingSpeed-help: Set relative speed for distance mouse motion
msgstr.mouseScalingSpeed-help: Set relative speed for scaling mouse motion
msgstr.mouseRotatingSpeed-help: Set relative speed for rotation mouse motion
msgstr.autoRotate-help: Default settings for the Auto Rotate camera view (U Hotkey)
msgstr.delay-help: Speed of rotation, which can be changed by +/- while rotating
msgstr.body_status: Object ${this.name} has ${this.polygonSize} polygons, ${this.edgeSize} edges, and ${this.vertexSize} vertices
